name: Brandon Tamayo~
text: Welcome! My strengths go beyond just the computer as I am well versed in customer service, adaptable, and am a fervent advocate for active listening with a desire and willingness to ensure communication remains open and clear, something I value in myself as much as in others. I hope to find a company with core values in community and communication where I can use my unique combination of grit, adaptability, and a team-focused nature to enhance our products at every level of the stack.
